channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for UT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for UT

item.title: Report X-2024041543
item.description:
Report X-2024041543

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-02T15:12:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-22
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO WET BOX UPON RETURNING TO PROCESSING CENTER AND OPENING DISCOVERED A ONE GALLON PLASTIC JUG OF SAPPHIR HIGH GLOSS TIRE SHINE PACKED SIDEWAYS WITH 2 INCHES OF FOAM PEANUTS THE CAP WAS LOOSE CAUSING APPRX. THREE OUNCES OF LIQUID TO LEAK UPON DOING A DOCUMENT SEARCH IN THE DOT TRANSPORTATION IT STATES THE PRODUCT IS AS UN 1993 FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS,N.O.S.(HEOTANE) HAZARD CLASS 3 PACKING GROUP II THE BOX DOESN'T HAVE ANY OUTER HAZARD PACKAGE MARKINGS SO THIS IS A SUSPECTED UNDECLARED HAZMAT

item.title: Report X-2024041377
item.description:
Report X-2024041377

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-01T15:11:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-23
  • City: LOGAN
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON THE SEND AGAIN TRAILER. BOTTOM OF PACKAGE SHOWES SIGNS OF AN INTERNAL LEAK. UPON INSPECTION IT WAS FOUND THAT THE GALLON OF HYDROGEN PEROXIDE WAS PACKAGED INSIDE OF A BAG. UPON A CLOSER INSPECTION THE CONTAINER OF HYDROGEN OF PEROXIDE HAD A LOT OF MOISTURE ON IT. COULD NOT FIND A SOURCE OF THE LEAK. THERE WERE NO VISIBLE CRACKS, DENTS, OR HOLES ON THE CONTAINER OF THE HYDROGEN PEROXIDE. THE CAP WAS NOT LOOSE.

item.title: Report X-2024041541
item.description:
Report X-2024041541

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-01T15:11:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-22
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: HAD AN UNDECLARED FROM WITH SAME SHIPPER PREVIOUSLY. AUDITOR SEEN PACKAGES COMING DOWN THE BELT AND GRABBED A COUPLE OF THEM. SECOND ONE THAT WAS PICKED UP SOUNDED LIKE AEROSOL CANS. NO MARKS OR LABELS ON OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS OPENED AND THERE WAS 3 PACKS OF TWO AEROSOL CANS, 6 TOTAL.

item.title: Report X-2024041243
item.description:
Report X-2024041243

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-30T18:16:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-19
  • City: OREM
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE FELL OFF THE BELT, WHEN AUDITOR PICKED UP PACKAGE IT SOUNDED LIKE IT HAD AEROSOL CANS IN IT. AUDITOR OPENED PACKAGE AND DISCOVERED THREE 2 PACK OF AIR FILTER CLEANER AND OIL ALL IN AEROSOL CANS. SIX AEROSOL CANS TOTAL.
